title: Lease today! No extra charge for contentment and relaxation
posting_body: ['WELCOME TO CRESTONE APARTMENTS IN VILLAGE EAST AURORA', 'Home just got a whole lot better.', 'Crestone’s spacious one, two, and three bedroom apartments and townhomes come with everything you could wish for to live comfortably in Aurora.', 'Our pet-friendly homes include many desirable features, including an in-home washer and dryer, fireplace, and hardwood-style flooring.', 'And the perks don’t end there.', 'Boasting a year-round pool and spa, fitness center with free weights, and onsite pet spa, our community amenities are truly worth celebrating.', 'On top of that, our convenient location puts you close to shopping, groceries, and downtown Denver.', 'It just doesn’t get any better.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Interested in more information?', 'Visit link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 722 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Electronic Thermostats', '- Fireplace*', '- Dishwasher', '- Hardwood-Style Flooring', '- Pet-Friendly Living – Dogs & Cats Welcome!', '- Energy-Efficient Appliances', '- Large Soaking Tubs*', '- Personal Covered Entrances', '- Washer & Dryer', '- Oversized Closets', '- Private Patio/Balcony', '-
